#summary How to install the Bogatyr framework library
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy
=Installation=
1) Just download the newest Bogatyr library `bogatyr_0.35.zip` from the [http://code.google.com/p/bogatyr/ project home], extract it and add the JAR to your own project (normally in the `/lib` directory).

2) Now you can access the package over `import ch.orwell.bogatyr.*`.

3) Extract and copy the two folders to your workspace or import it in your IDE:
  
  * cfg

  * res
4) Move the file `cfg/ch/orwell/bogatyr/standard.properties` to `cfg/yourapp/standard.properties`. Open the `standard.properties` with any text editor and enter the correct settings for your application. If you use `i18n`, then do the same with the resource files (and add your own language).

5) If you use an `IDE`, go to `run` and select as main method `ch.orwell.bogatyr.controller.Runner`. 
As parameter `ch.orwell.yourapp.YourApp /cfg/ch/orwell/yourapp/standard.properties`.
Now run the application.

Without IDE, you must first compile your application with `javac` and enter this on your command prompt:
  * `java -jar /lib/bogatyr_0.35.jar ch.orwell.yourapp.YourApp ./cfg/ch/orwell/yourapp/standard.properties`

6) Enjoy! `(hopefully)` :-)
